column3: wohyiaa ayefor wɔ Kaana a ɔwɔ Galilii
column4: nna Jesus ne na wɔ hɔ;"

column2: "na wɔtoo nsa frɛɛ Jesus nye n’esuafo no so baa ayefor no ase."

column3: Jesus ne na kɛkaa kyerɛɛ no dɛ
Ɔbaa
column4: menye wo wɔ ebɛn nhyehyɛɛ? Me ber nnyae nndurii."

column3: Biribiara a ɔbɛse hom no
dɛ mbrɛ Jewfo hɔn ahoguar tse
column4: kor bedzi etwahina ebien anaa ebiasa."

column3: Hom mfa nsu nhyehyɛ esuhina no amaama.  Na wɔhyehyɛɛ no amaama tɛntɛn."
Afei hom nsesaw nkɛma edzidziase panyin no.  Na wɔdze kɔree."

column2: "Na edzidziase panyin no kaa n’ano nsu a ɔadan nsa no hwɛe no
column3: na onnyim mbrɛ ofir no (nna asomfo no a wɔsesaw nsu no dze wonyim)
column7: Nyimpa biara dze nsa papa no dzi kan besisi hɔ
column9: nna wɔdze dza onnye no ba
column11: edze nsa papa no esie ebodu sesei."

column2: "Nsɛnkyerɛdze a odzi kan yi Jesus yɛe wɔ Kaana a ɔwɔ Galilii
column3: na oyii n’enyimnyam kyerɛe; na n’esuafo no gyee no dzii."
Jesus kɔr Karpernaum
column4: ɔno nye ne na nye no nuanom nye n’esuafo
column5: na wɔtsenaa hɔ nda kakra ara."

column2: "Na Jewfo apaho no bɛnee; na Jesus kɔr Jerusalɛm."

column3: nye nguan
column5: nye sikasesafo wɔ asɔrdan no mu dɛ wɔtsenatsena hɔ."

column2: "Ɔdze ahoma yɛɛ mpire paam hɔn nyina
column3: nguan no nye anantwi no
ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column4: Hom mfa yinom mfi ha! Mma hom nnyɛ m’Egya fie eguadzi fie!"

column2: "Na n’esuafo no kaae dɛ wɔakyerɛw dɛ
column3: Wo fie ho mbɔdzembɔ bɛhyɛ me ma."

column2: "Iyi ntsi Jewfo no buae see no dɛ
column3: Ebɛn asɛnkyerɛdze na edze kyerɛ hɛn dɛ ewɔ ho kwan dɛ eyɛ iyi?"
Hom ndwuruw asɔrdan yi
column4: na ndaansa mu mebɛma do bio."

column3: Mfe eduanan esia mu na wɔdze sii asɔrdan yi
column4: na ɔwo ebɛma do nda ebiasa mu?"

column3: ɔkaa ne nyimpadua asɔrdan no ho asɛm."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi ɔsoɛree fii ewufo mu no
column3: n’esuafo no kaae dɛ ɔkaa iyi kyerɛɛ hɔn
column4: na wɔgyee kyerɛwsɛm no nye asɛm a Jesus kae no dzii."

column2: "Na ɔwɔ Jerusalɛm apaho afahyɛ no mu no dodowara hun ne nsɛnkyerɛdze a ɔyɛe no
column3: na wɔgyee ne dzin dzii;"
ɔammfa noho amma hɔn
column6: "na onnhia no dɛ obi dzi nyimpa ho dase
column7: osiandɛ nankasa nyim dza ɔwɔ nyimpa mu."
